Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/gmp/dist/assert.c

1/* GMP assertion failure handler.
2

5 FUTURE GNU MP RELEASES.

12it under the terms of either:
13
14 * the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free
15 Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
16 option) any later version.
17

19

21 Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any
22 later version.
23
24or both in parallel, as here.
25
26The GNU MP Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
27WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
28or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
29for more details.
30
31You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
32GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
33see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
34
35#include <stdio.h>
36#include <stdlib.h>
37#include "gmp.h"
38#include "gmp-impl.h"
39
40
41void
42__gmp_assert_header (const char *filename, int linenum)
43{
44 if (filename != NULL && filename[0] != '\0')
45 {
46 fprintf (stderr, "%s:", filename);
47 if (linenum != -1)
48 fprintf (stderr, "%d: ", linenum);
49 }
50}
51
52void
53__gmp_assert_fail (const char *filename, int linenum,
54 const char *expr)
55{
56 __gmp_assert_header (filename, linenum);
57 fprintf (stderr, "GNU MP assertion failed: %s\n", expr);
58 abort();
59}
60
